titles.title: A resolution relating to the reappointment of Michael Davidson as Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Declares that the reappointment of Michael Davidson as Senate Legal Counsel is effective as of January 3, 1987, and that such term of service shall expire at the end of the 101st Congress.
